channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft Sued For Killing Windows 10—All Users Must Act Now
item.description: Microsoft accused of putting 700 million users at risk of attack.

item.title: ChatGPT As Your Bedside Companion: Can It Deliver Compassion, Commitment, And Care?

item.title: The Perseids Are Peaking Now — Here’s How To Beat The Moonlight
item.description: It may peak on Aug. 12-13, but “shooting stars” from the Perseid meteor shower are best seen this week because of a bright moon in early-mid-August.

item.title: See The ‘Planet Parade’ On Monday As Venus And Jupiter Twin

item.description: If you get this message, it's an attack.
